    • Constructor Detail

      • KafkaUtils

        public KafkaUtils()

    • Method Detail

      • getTopicName

        public static String getTopicName(State state)
        Get topic name from a State object. The State should contain property KafkaSource.TOPIC_NAME.

      • getPartition

        public static KafkaPartition getPartition(State state)
        Get KafkaPartition from a State object. The State should contain properties KafkaSource.TOPIC_NAME, KafkaSource.PARTITION_ID, and may optionally contain KafkaSource.LEADER_ID and KafkaSource.LEADER_HOSTANDPORT.

      • getPartitions

        public static List<KafkaPartition> getPartitions(State state)
        Get a list of KafkaPartitions from a State object. The given State should contain property KafkaSource.TOPIC_NAME. If there are multiple partitions in the State, all partitions should have the same topic name. It first checks whether the given State contains "partition.id.i", "leader.id.i" and "leader.hostandport.i", i = 0,1,2,... Otherwise it will call getPartition(State).

      • getPartitionPropName

        public static String getPartitionPropName(String topicName,
                                          int partitionId)
        This method returns topicName + '.' + partitionId.

      • containsPartitionAvgRecordSize

        public static boolean containsPartitionAvgRecordSize(State state,
                                                     KafkaPartition partition)
        Determines whether the given State contains "[topicname].[partitionid].avg.record.size".

      • getPartitionAvgRecordSize

        public static long getPartitionAvgRecordSize(State state,
                                             KafkaPartition partition)
        Get the average record size of a partition, which is stored in property "[topicname].[partitionid].avg.record.size". If state doesn't contain this property, it returns defaultSize.

      • setPartitionAvgRecordSize

        public static void setPartitionAvgRecordSize(State state,
                                             KafkaPartition partition,
                                             long size)
        Set the average record size of a partition, which will be stored in property "[topicname].[partitionid].avg.record.size".

      • containsPartitionAvgRecordMillis

        public static boolean containsPartitionAvgRecordMillis(State state,
                                                       KafkaPartition partition)
        Determines whether the given State contains "[topicname].[partitionid].avg.record.millis".

      • getPartitionAvgRecordMillis

        public static double getPartitionAvgRecordMillis(State state,
                                                 KafkaPartition partition)
        Get the average time to pull a record of a partition, which is stored in property "[topicname].[partitionid].avg.record.millis". If state doesn't contain this property, it returns defaultValue.

      • setPartitionAvgRecordMillis

        public static void setPartitionAvgRecordMillis(State state,
                                               KafkaPartition partition,
                                               double millis)
        Set the average time in milliseconds to pull a record of a partition, which will be stored in property "[topicname].[partitionid].avg.record.millis".
